Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: wodalitsika ndiye amene mmanja mwake muli Ufumu ndipo ali ndi mphamvu pa zinthu zonse
Iye amene adalenga imfa ndi moyo kuti akhoza kukuyesani inu kuti ndani wa inu amene wasunga malamulo onse mwaubwino. Ndipo Iye ndi Wamphamvu ndi Wokhululukira

Iye ndi amene adalenga miyamba isanu ndi iwiri, wina pamwamba pa unzake. Inu simungaone cholakwa china chilichonse mu chilengedwe cha Mwini chisoni chosatha. Tapenyetsetsani! Kodi inu mungaone cholakwika china chilichonse
Tapenyetsetsaninso! Ndipo mawonekedwe anu adzakubwererani pamene ali osokonezeka ndi otopa
Ndithudi Ife takongoletsa thambo loyamba ndi nyali ndipo tazipanga nyalizo ngati mipaliro yothamangitsira Satana ndipo tawakonzera iwo chilango chamoto woyaka
Ndipo iwo amene sakhulupirira mwa Ambuye wawo, kuli chilango cha kumoto ndipo chimaliziro chawo chidzakhala choipa
Ndipo pamene iwo adzaponyedwa m’moto, iwo adzaumva uli kuyaka ndi kubwata
Pafupifupi kuphulika chifukwa cha kukwiya. Ndipo nthawi zonse pamene gulu liponyedwamo, amene amayang’anira moto adzafunsa kuti: “Kodi panalibe wina aliyense amene adadza kwa inu kudzakuchenjezani?”
Ndipo iwo adzati: “Inde. Ndithudi Mchenjezi adadza kwa ife koma tidamukana ndipo tinkati: Mulungu sadavumbulutse china chilichonse ndipo iwe ndiwe wosokoneza kwambiri.”
Ndipo iwo adzati: “Tikadakhala kuti tidamvera kapena kuganiza bwino, ife sitikadakhala m’gulu la anthu opita ku moto.”
Motero iwo adzabvomera machimo awo. Motero apite kutali anthu a ku moto
Ndithudi! Iwo amene amaopa Ambuye wawo ngakhale samuona, ndithudi, iwo adzawakhululukira machimo awo ndipo adzalandira mphotho ya mtengo wapatali
Ndipo kaya mubisa mawu anu kapena muulula, Iye amadziwa zonse zimene zili m’mitima mwanu
Kodi Iye amene adalenga zinthu zonse asadziwe? Ndithudi Iye ndi wa Chisoni chosatha ndi Mwini kudziwa chili chonse
Iye ndiye amene anakukonzerani dziko, motero pitani paliponse mu ilo, ndipo idyani zokoma zake zimene wakupatsanindipondikwaIyekumenezonsezidzabwerera
Kodi inu mumaganiza kuti ndinu wokhazikika moti Iye amene ali pamwamba pa kumwamba sangathe kung’amba nthaka imene ili pansi panu kuti ikumezeni? Taonani! Ili kugwedezeka
Kapena mumaganiza kuti inu ndinu okhazikika kuposa zimene zili kumwamba kuti Iye sangathe kukutumizirani mphepo ya mkuntho? Kotero inu mudzadziwa kuopsa kwa chenjezo langa
Ndithudi iwo amene adalipo kale anakana. Kodi chilango changa chinali bwanji
Kodiiwosaonambalamezimenezimaulukapamwamba pawo, zikutambasula ndi kutseka mapiko awo? Palibe chimene chimazigwira kupatula Mwini chisoni chosatha. Ndithudi Iye amaona chilichonse
Kodi ndani amene angakuthandizeni inu kupatula Mwini chisoni chosatha? Anthu onse osakhulupirira ndi olakwa
Kodi ndani amene angakupatseni chisamaliro ngati Iye atakaniza chisamaliro chake? Koma iwo amapitiriza kuchita mtudzu ndi kugalukira
Kodi iye amene amayenda osaona ndi ofanana ndi amene walangizidwa kapena amene amayenda mu njira yoyenera
Nena: “Ndiye amene adakulengani inu ndipo adakupatsani makutu, maso ndi mitima. Inu simuthokoza kawirikawiri.”
Nena: “Ndiye amene anakulengani inu kuchokera ku doti ndipo kwa Iye nonse mudzasonkhanitsidwa.”
Iwo amati: “Kodi lonjezo limeneli lidzakwaniritsidwa liti ngati zimene ulikunena ndi zoona?”
Nena: “Mulungu yekha ndiye amene adziwa nthawi yake. Ntchito yanga ndikungokuchenjezani basi.”
Koma pamene iwo adzachiona chili nkudza pafupi, nkhope za anthu osakhulupirira zidzakhala za chisoni ndipo kudzanenedwa kuti: “Ichi ndi chimaliziro chimene munkafunsa kuti chidzafika liti?”
Nena: “Ndiuzeni! Kodi ngati Mulungu atandiononga ine pamodzi ndi iwo amene ali nane, ngakhale kuti Iye adzaonetsa chifundo pa ife, ndani amene angateteze anthu osakhulupirira ku chilango chowawa?”
Nena: “Iye ndi Mwini chifundo chosatha, mwa Iye ife timakhulupirira ndipo mwa Iye ife timaika chikhulupiriro chathu. Kotero inu mudzadziwa posachedwapa kuti ndani amene ali wochimwa.”
Nena: “Ndiuzeni! Kodi ngati madzi anu ataphwa, ndani amene angakupatseni inu madzi oyenda?”
Nun. Pali cholembera ndi zimene amalemba
Mwachisomo cha Ambuye wako, sindiwe wamisala ayi
Ndithudi iwe udzalandira mphotho yosatha
Ndithudi iwe uli ndi makhalidwe abwino
Iwe udzaona ndipo nawo adzaona
Kuti ndani wa inu amene ndi wamisala
Ndithudi Ambuye wako amadziwa bwino amene wasochera ku njira yake ndipo amadziwa bwino amene amayenda m’njira yoyenera
Motero usatsatire zochita za anthu osakhulupirira
Iwo afuna utagwirizana nawo kuti nawonso agwirizane nawe
Ndipo usamvere zonena za munthu wotukwana amene alibe phindu
Woononga mbiri ya anzake ponena Al Qalam	613 za bodza
Woletsa ntchito zachilungamo, wophwanya malamulo ndi wochita zoipa
woipa mtima ndipo wobadwa mosalongosoka
Chifukwa iye ali ndi chuma ndi ana
Pamene chivumbulutso chathu chilakatulidwa kwa iye, amati: “Ndi nkhani za anthu a makedzana.”
Ife tidzaika chizindikiro pa mphuno pake
Ndithudi Ife tidawayesa iwo monga momwe tidawayesera eni ake a munda, amene adalumbira kuti adzakolola mbewu zawo m’mawa mwake
Osaonjezera mawu oti: “Ngati Mulungu alola.”
Kotero kudadutsa china chake chochokera kwa Ambuye wako nthawi ya usiku ndi kuwotcha pamene iwo anali kugona
Ndipo m’mawa, munda udasanduka wakuda monga mdima wa usiku
Ndipo mmawa iwo adaitanizana wina ndi mnzake
Nati: “Mulawirire ku munda ngati mufuna kukakolola.”
Ndipo iwo adapita, namanong’onezana wina ndi mnzake
“Palibe munthu wosauka amene adzaloledwa kulowa m’mundamo kudzapempha”
Ndipo m’mawa, onse adapita ndi mphamvu zotchinjirizira anthu osauka
Koma pamene iwo adaona zimene zidachitika, onse adati: “Ndithudi ife talakwa.”
“Iai! Ndithudi ife tapwetekeka.”
wangwiro amene anali pakati pawo adati: “Kodi ine sindidakuuzeni kuti bwanji inu simunena kuti: Ngati Mulungu alola?”
“Iwo adati ulemerero ukhale kwa Ambuye wathu! Ndithudi ife ndife olakwa.”
Ndipo iwo adayamba kudzudzulana kuti wina adali wolakwa
Iwo adati: “Tsoka kwa ife! Ndithudi Ife tidali ophwanya malamulo.”
“Mwina kuti Ambuye wathu adzatipatsa munda wina wabwino m’malo mwa uwu. Ndithudi ndi kwa Iye kumene timapempha modzichepetsa.”
Chimenechi ndicho chilango koma ndithudi chilango cha m’moyo umene uli nkudza ndi chowawa kwambiri, iwo akadadziwa
Ndithudi anthu onse angwiro adzalandira minda ya madalitso imene ili ndi Ambuye wawo
Kodi Ife tidzasamala anthu angwiro chimodzimodzi ndi anthu ochimwa
Kodi mwatani? Kodi inu mumaweruza bwanji
Kapena kodi muli ndi Buku limene mumawerengamo
Kuti inu mudzapeza m’menemo chilichonse chimene mukufuna
Kapena inu mwalandira kuchokera kwa Ife, lonjezo lotsimikizika mpaka pa tsiku louka kwa akufa kuti, ndithudi, inu mudzapeza zimene mukufuna
Tawafunsa ngati wina wa iwo angachitire umboni za lonjezolo
Kapena, kodi iwo ali ndi milungu ina? Aleke abweretse milungu yawo ngati iwo anena zoona
Ndipatsikulimenechinthuchoopsachidzachitika, iwo adzaitanidwa kuti apembedze, koma adzalephera kutero
Maso awo adzayang’ana pansi ndipo adzanyozedwa kwambiri chifukwa iwo adauzidwa kupembedza pamene adali pa mtendere
Kotero ndisiyire aliyense amene akutsutsana ndi chenjezo ili. Ife tidzawalanga pang’onopang’ono m’njira imene iwo saizindikira
Ndipo Ine ndidzalekerera pa kanthawi! Ndithudi chikonzero changa ndi champhamvu
Kapena kodi iwe uli kuwafunsa malipiro moti iwo ali ndi ngongole yambiri
Kapena kodi iwo amadziwa za Buku lobisika kuti iwo akhoza kulemba
Motero pirira podikilira chiweruzo cha Ambuye wako ndipo usakhale ngati amene adamezedwa ndi nsomba pamene adalira kupempha chithandizo iye ali m’mavuto
Ngati Ambuye wake akadapanda kumuonetsa chisomo chake, ndithudi iye akadakhalabe koma iye adaponyedwa pa mtunda pamene anali wolakwa
Koma Ambuye wake adamusankha ndipo adamuchititsa kukhala wabwino
Ndipo, ndithudi, iwo onse osakhulupirira akadakusokeretsa ndi maso awo pamene amakumbutsidwa ndipo amati: “Ndithudi uyu ndi Wamisala.”
Koma ichi si china koma chikumbutso kwa zolengedwa zonse

Kodi ndi chiyani chimene chingakupangitse kuti udziwe kuti choonadi chenicheni ndi chiti

Ndipo anthu a Aad adaonongeka ndi chimphepo cha mkuntho

Chimene Mulungu adachilamulira kuti chikunthe pa iwo usiku usanu ndi uwiri ndi usana usanu ndi utatu mosalekeza. Moti iwe ukadawaona anthu atagonagona ukadayesa kuti ndi mitengo ya migwalangwa yakugwa
Kodi uli kuona wina wa iwo opulumuka

Ndipo iwo sanamvere Mtumwi wochokera kwa Ambuye wawo ndipo Iye adawalanga ndi chilango chowawa zedi

Kuti tikhoza kuchipanga icho kukhala chikumbutso ndi kuti khutu la kumva limve
Ndipo pamene lipenga lidzaimbidwa kamodzi
Ndipo nthaka ndi mapiri anyamulidwa pamodzi ndi kuponyedwa pansi mwamphamvu kamodzi
Patsiku limeneli chinthu choopsa chidzachitika
Ndipo thambo lidzaphwanyika ndipo lidzakhala lopanda mphamvu
Ndipo Angelo adzaima mbali zonse ndipo angelo asanu ndi atatu pa tsikuli adzanyamula Mpando wa Chifumu wa Ambuye wako
Patsiku limeneli mudzaweruzidwa ndipo palibe chinthu chachinsinsi chimene chidzabisika
Ndipo yense amene adzapatsidwa Buku lake kudzanja lamanja adzati: “Ah taonani! Werengani Buku langa!”
Ndithudi, ine ndidakhululupira kuti tsiku lina zochita zanga zidzaweruzidwa
Kotero iye adzakhala ndi moyo wa chisangalalo
M’munda wapamwamba
Wa zipatso zokoma zimene zili pafupi
Idyani ndipo imwani mmene mufunire chifukwa cha ntchito zanu zabwino zimene mudatumiza patsogolo panu m’masiku apitawo
Koma iye amene adzapatsidwe buku lake m’dzanja lamanzere, adzati: “Kukadakhala bwino ngati Buku langa likadakhala losaperekedwa kwa ine.”
“Ndipo sindikadziwa kuti zochita zanga zachuluka bwanji.”
“Ikadakhala bwino imfa ikadangodza pa ine.”
“Chuma changa sichidandithandize chilichonse.”
“Ulamuliro wanga wonse wachoka kwa ine.”
“Mugwireni ndipo mumumange.”
“Ndipo m’ponyeni M’ng’anjo ya moto.”
“Ndipo mumangeni ndi unyolo wotalika malipande makumi asanu ndi awiri.”
Ndithudi, iye samakhulupirira mwa Mulungu wamkulu

Motero lero iye sadzakhala ndi bwenzi aliyense

Ndipo si mawu a Mlakatuli ayi ndipo chikhulupiriro chanu ndi chochepa
Ndipo si mawu a munthu wa maula ayi, ndipo ndi zochepa zimene inu mukumbukira

Ndipo palibe, wina wa inu, amene akadatiletsa Ife kumugwira
Ndipo, ndithudi, Korani iyi ndi chikumbutso kwa iwo amene amapewa zoipa
Ndipo, ndithudi, Ife timadziwa kuti alipo ena a inu amene amaikana
Ndipo, ndithudi, ilo lidzakhala lomvetsa chisoni kwa anthu osakhulupirira

Ndipo palibe bwenzi amene adzafunse za bwenzi lake
Iwo azidzawaona iwo. Munthu wochita zoipa adzafunitsitsa kuti mwina akhoza kudzipulumutsa ku chilango cha tsikuli popereka ana ake
Ndi mkazi wake ndi m’bale wake
Ndi anansi ake amene adamusunga
Ndipo zonse zimene zili padziko lapansi kuti mwina zikhoza kumupulumutsa

Ndithudi Munthu adalengedwa kukhala wosapirira

Iwo amene amapemphera mowirikiza
Ndi iwo amene m’chuma chawo muli gawo limene amasiya padera
Kuti apereke kwa anthu opempha ndi amene ali pa mavuto
Ndi iwo amene amakhulupirira kuti kudzakhala tsiku lachiweruzo
Ndi iwo amene amachita mantha ndi chilango cha Ambuye wawo
Ndithudi chilango cha Ambuye ndi chosatetezeka
Ndi iwo amene amadzisunga
Kupatula akazi awo ndi akapolo awo chifukwa iwo sadzadzudzulidwa
Koma aliyense amene afuna kuposa awa, ndi wophwanya malamulo
Ndi iwo amene amasunga malonjezo ndi malamulo awo
Ndi iwo amene amapereka umboni woona nthawi zonse
Ndi iwo amene amalabadira mapemphero awo
Awa ndiwo amene adzalemekezeka m’minda ya Paradiso
Kodi chachitika ndi chiyani kwa anthu osakhulupirira kuti azibwera mwaliwiro kudza kwa iwe

Motero, Ine ndilumbira pa Ambuye wa malo onse a kum’mawa ndi kumadzulo kuti Ife tikhoza
Kuika anthu ena abwino m’malo mwawo ndipo palibe chinthu chimene chingatiletse kutero
Motero asiye ayambe adzinyenga ndi chisangalalo mpaka pamene adzakumana ndi tsiku lawo limene adalonjezedwa
Tsiku limene adzatuluka mwansanga m’manda mwawo ngati anthu a pa mpikisano umene amalandirirapo mphotho
Atayang’ana maso awo pansi ndipo adzachititsidwa manyazi. Limeneli ndilo tsiku limene analonjezedwa
Ndithudi tidatumiza Nowa kwa anthu ake: “Chenjeza anthu ako chilango chowawa chisadafike pa iwo.”
Iye adati: “oh inu anthu anga! Ndithudi ine, ndine Mchenjezi wooneka kwa inu.”
“Kuti muzipembedza Mulungu ndi kumuopa Iye ndipo mundimvere ine.”
“Iye adzakukhululukirani machimo anu ndi kukusungani bwino mpaka nthawi ya imfa yanu. Ndithudi nthawi ya Mulungu ikakwana, palibe wina aliyense amene angaibwezere m’mbuyo inu mukadadziwa.”
Iye adati: “oh Ambuye! Ndithudi usana ndi usiku ndakhala ndiri kuwaitana anthu anga.”
“Koma kuitana kwanga kwangoonjezera kusamvera kwawo.”

“Ndipo, ndithudi, nthawi yonse imene ndiitana kuti Inu muwakhululukire, iwo amatenga zala zawo ndi kutseka m’makutu mwawo ndipo amatenga mikhanjo yawo ndi kufunditsa kumutu kwawo ndipo amapitirirabe kuchita zoipa monyada.”
“Ndipo, ndithudi, ine ndidalalikira mokweza kwa iwo.”
“Ndipo, ndithudi, ndidawalankhula pagulu ndi mwamseri.”
Ndidawauza: “Funsani chikhululukiro cha Ambuye wanu. Ndithudi Iye amakhululukira nthawi zonse.”
“Iye adzakutumizirani Nuh	621 mvula yochuluka.”
“Ndikukupatsani inu chuma, ana, minda ndi mitsinje.”
Kodi mwatani, inu simuyembekeza mphotho
Pamene Iye adakulengani inu m’nthawi zosiyana siyana
Kodi inu simuona mmene Mulungu adalengera miyamba isanu ndi iwiri, wina pamwamba pa unzake
Ndipo anapanga mwezi ngati muuni ndi dzuwa ngati nyali
Mulungu adakulengani inu kuchokera ku nthaka
Ndipo ku nthaka komweko adzakubwezerani inu ndi kukudzutsaninso
Ndipo Mulungu adalenga dziko kukhala lalikulu kwa inu
Kuti muziyenda m’njira zambiri za zikuluzikulu
Nowa adati: “oh Ambuye! Anthu anga sali kundimvera ine koma mmalo mwake ali kutsatira amene sangawaonjezere chuma ndi ana koma mavuto.”
Ndipo iwo akonza chiwembu champhamvu
Ndipo ati: “Mwanjira ina iliyonse inu musaleke kupembedza milungu yanu. Musaleke kupembedza Wadd, Suwa, Yaghuth, Yauq kapena Nasr.”
“Ndipo, ndithudi, iwo asocheza anthu ambiri. Ndipo Inu musaonjeze china chili chonse kwa anthu ochita zoipa chifukwa apitirizabe kuchita zoipa.”
Chifukwa cha machimo awo iwo anamizidwa ndipo adaponyedwa ku moto ndipo iwo sanapeze wina aliyense kuti awathandize, m’malo mwa Mulungu
Ndipo Nowa adati: Ambuye wanga! Musasiye munthu aliyense padziko lapansi mwa anthu osakhulupirira
“Ngati Inu muwasiya iwo adzasocheretsa akapolo anu okhulupirira ndipo iwo adzabereka anthu ochita zoipa ndi osakhulupirira.”

“Ambuye wanga! Ndikhululukireni ine ndi makolo anga ndi iye amene alowa mnyumba yanga ngati wokhulupirira ndiponso okhulupirira onse amuna ndi akazi. Ndipo kwa anthu osakhulupilira, Inu musawaonjezere china koma chionongeko
Nena: “Zavumbulutsidwa kwa ine kuti gulu la majini lidamvera chivumbulutso cha Mulungu ndipo lidati: Ndithudi ife tamva mawu odabwitsa.”
“Amene apereka dongosolo la kunjira yoyenera ndipo ife takhulupirira zonse zimene zinali kunenedwa ndipo ife sitidzalambira wina aliyense kupatula Ambuye wathu.”
‘Ulemerero ukhale kwa Ambuye wathu. Iye sadakwatire kapena kubereka ana
‘Ndipo kuti anthu opusa amene ali pakati pathu akhala ali kumanenera Mulungu zinthu zonyasa kwambiri
‘Ndipo, ndithudi, ife timaganiza kuti kulibe munthu kapena majini amene angakanene chinthu chabodza chokhudza Mulungu
‘Ndipo, ndithudi, padali anthu pakati pa mtundu wa anthu amene amapeza chitetezo kuchokera kwa anthu a mtundu wa majinn. Koma iwo adangoonjezera kuchita zoipa ndi kusakhulupilira
‘Ndipo iwo adayamba kuganiza monga momwe inu mumaganizira, kuti Mulungu sadzadzutsa wina aliyense
‘Ndipo ife tidafuna kupita kuthambo la pamwamba zedi ndipo tidaona kuti linali lodzadzidwa ndi ogwira ntchito a mphamvu ndi nyenyezi za moto
‘Ndithudi ife tinali Al Jinn	623 kukhala m’menemo kumvetsera koma amene azimvetsera tsopano, adzapeza malawi a moto uli kumudikira
‘Ife sitidziwa ngati akuwafunira mavuto anthu awo amene ali padziko lapansi kapena kuti Ambuye wawo ali ndi cholinga choti awatsogolere
‘Alipo ena pakati pathu amene ndi angwiro pamene ena ndi ochimwa. Ife ndife magulu otsatira njira zosiyanasiyana
‘Ndipo ife timaganiza kuti sitingathawe Mulungu padziko lapansi ndiponso sitingathawe pothamangitsidwa
‘Ndipo, ndithudi, pamene tidamva ulangizi wake, ife tidakhulupirira ndipo aliyense amene amakhulupirira mwa Ambuye wake sakhala ndi mantha otaya zake kapena kuponderezedwa
‘Ndipo pakati pathu pali ena amene amadzipereka kwathunthu kwa Mulungu ndi ena amene amachita zoipa. Iwo amene adzipereka kwa Mulungu amatsatira njira yoyenera.”
Ndipo iwo amene amachita zoipa adzakhala nkhuni za ku Gahena
Ngati iwo akanakhulupirira ndi kutsatira njira yoyenera, Ife, ndithudi, tikadawapatsa mvula yambiri
Kuti tikhoza kuwayesa ndi izo. Ndi aliyense amene samvera chenjezo la Ambuye wake. Iye adzakonza kuti alandire chilango chowawa zedi
Ndipo Mizikiti ndi ya Mulungu yekha. Motero musapembedze mulungu wina pambali pa Mulungu m’modzi yekha
Ndipo pamene kapolo wa Mulungu anaima kupempha kwa Iye, iwo adamuzungulira mu unyinji wawo mopanikizana
Nena: “Ine ndimapempha kwa Ambuye wanga ndipo sindimufanizira Iye ndi wina aliyense.”
Nena: “Ine ndilibe mphamvu yobweretsa pa inu chinthu choipa kapena kukubweretsani ku njira yoyenera.”
Nena: “Palibe wina aliyense amene anganditeteze ine kwa Mulungu ndipo ine sindingapeze kothawira kwina kulikonse kupatula kwa Iye yekha.”
“Udindo wanga ndi kukuuzani choonadi chimene ndalandira kuchokera kwa Mulungu ndi Uthenga wake, ndipo aliyense amene amanyoza Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake adzakhala ku moto wa ku Gahena nthawi zonse.”

Mpaka pamene iwo ataona kuopsa kwa chilango chimene chidalonjezedwa kuti chidzafika pa iwo, pamenepo ndipo pamene adzadziwa mbali imene wopanda mphamvu ali ndipo kuti ndi ayani amene anali wochepa m’chiwerengero
Nena: “Ine sindidziwa ngati chimene mwalonjezedwa chidzafika msanga kapena kuti Ambuye wangaadachiikapatali.”
Iyeyekhandiyeameneamadziwa zonse zobisika ndipo zinsinsi zake saululira wina aliyense ayi
Kupatula kwa Atumwi ake amene Iye amawasankha yekha. Ndipo Iye amatumiza gulu la Atetezi amene amayenda patsogolo ndi pambuyo pawo
Amawateteza mpaka pamene aona kuti iwo apereka uthenga wochokera kwa Ambuye wawo. Ndipo Iye amadziwa chili chonse chimene ali nacho ndipo Iye amasunga chiwerengero cha chinthu chili chonse
Oh iwe amene wadzikulunga m’chovala
Dzuka usiku onse kupatula kwanthawi kochepa
Theka la usikuwo kapena kanthawi kocheperako
Kapena kwa kanthawi kochulukirapo ndipo lakatula Korani modekha ndi modukizadukiza monga mmene umayenera kuchitikira
Ndithudi, Ife tidzakutumizira Mawu a mphamvu
Ndithudi kuuka nthawi ya usiku ndi kovuta, ndipo mau amatchulidwa bwino
Ndithudi, iwe masana umatangwanika kwambiri
Ndipo uzikumbukira dzina la Ambuye wako ndipo udzipereke kwathunthu kwa Iye
Iye ndiye Ambuye wa kum’mawa ndi wa kumadzulo. Kulibe Mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Mulandire Iye kuti akhale Mtetezi wako
Pirira pa zonse zimene ali kunena ndipo siyana nawo mwaulemu
Undisiyire Ine onse amene amakana choonadi nthawi zonse ndipo pirira ndi iwo pakanthawi kochepa
Ife, ndithudi, tili ndi unyolo ndipo tawasungira moto wosatha kuuzima
Ndi chakudya chotsamwitsa ndi chilango chowawa
Patsiku limene dziko ndi mapiri zidzagwedezeka kwambiri ndipo mapiri adzakhala mulu wa mchenga wotaika umene umatuluka kupansi
Ndithudi Ife tatumiza Mtumwi kukhala umboni wokutsutsani monga momwe tidatumizira Mtumwi kwa Farao
Koma Farao sadamumvere Mtumwi ndipo Ife tidamulanga ndi chilango choopsa
Kodi ngati inu simukhulupirira, mudzalithawa bwanji tsiku limene lidzachititsa ana anu a ang’ono kukhala ndi imvi
Tsiku limene thambo la kumwamba lidzang’ambika pakati. Ndithudi lonjezo la Mulungu lidzakwaniritsidwa
Ndithudi ili ndi chenjezo chabe, motero musiyeni aliyense amene afuna kuti atsatire njira yoyenera yonka kwa Ambuye wake kuti aitsatire

NdithudiAmbuye wako amadziwa kuti nthawi zina iwe umakhala tcheru mphindi ziwiri pakati pa mphindi zitatu za usiku, mwina theka la usiku ndipo nthawi zina mphindi imodzi pakati pa mphindi zitatu za usiku, monga momwe gulu lina la anthu amene ali nawe. Ndipo Mulungu ndiye amene amasiyanitsa usiku ndi usana. Iye amadziwa kuti siungathe kupemphera mphindi zonse ndipo wakuyang’ana mwachisoni. Kotero lakatula magawo ena a Korani amene angakhale apafupi kwa iwe. Iye amadziwa kuti pakati panu pali anthu odwala ndi ena amene ali kupita uku ndi uku padziko kufunafuna zokoma za Mulungu ndi ena amene ali kumenya nkhondo m’njira ya Mulungu. Motero lakatula, mawu a m’Korani, amene ungathe kulakatula, ndipo pitiriza kupemphera ndipo pereka msonkho wothandiza anthu osauka ndipo kongoza ngongole yabwino kwa Mulungu ndipo chabwino chilichonse chimene muli kutsogoza, mudzachipeza kwa Mulungu, chitasungidwa bwino ndipo mudzalandira mphotho ya mtengo wapatali kuchokera kwa Iye. Ndipo pempha chikhululukiro kwa Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi wokhululukira ndi wa chisoni chosatha
ohiweamenewakutidwa
Dzukandikuperekachenjezo
Ndipo lemekeza Ambuye wako
Ndipo yeretsa zovala zako
Ndipo pewa zonse za mafano
Ndipo usapereke thandizo ndi cholinga chopezamo cholowa
Ndipo khala wopirira chifukwa cha Ambuye wako
Ndipo pamene lipenga lidzalira
Ndithudi limeneli lidzakhala tsiku loopsa
Tsiku lamavuto kwa anthu onse osakhulupirira
Ndisiye ndekha kuthana ndi munthu amene ndidamulenga ndekha
Ndipo ndidamupatsa chuma chosawerengeka
Ndi ana okhala pambali pake
Ndipo Ine ndidamuchitira zonse kuti zikhale zolongosoka ndi zapafupi
Koma nthawi zonse amafuna kuti ndizimupatsabe zinthu zambiri
Kosatheka! Ndithudi iye wakhala ali kuchitira mwano chivumbulutso chathu
Ine ndidzamukhaulitsa pomupatsa chilango chowawa
Ndithudi iye adaganiza ndipo adakonza chiwembu
Ndipo ayenera kutembererewa chifukwa cha chiwembu chake
Motero iye ayenera kutembereredwa chifukwa cha chiwembu chake
Ndipo iye anayang’ana
Ndipo iye adachita matsinya ndipo anaonetsa kuipidwa
Kenaka adatembenukira kumbali modzikweza
Ndipo iye adati: “Ichi sichina koma matsenga a anthu a amakedzana!”
“Ichi sichina koma mawu a munthu chabe.”
Ine ndidzamuponya iye ku Gahena
Kodi chidzakudziwitsa kuti moto wa ku Gahena ndi chiani
Iwo susunga kapena kusiya
Umatentha matupi
Umasamalidwandiangelokhumindiasanundianayi

Ife sitidasankhe wina aliyense koma angelo kuti aziyang’anira moto ndipo tinakhazikitsa chiwerengero chawo ngati mayesero kwa anthu osakhulupirira, kuti iwo onse amene alandira mawu a Mulungu akhulupirire ndi kuti anthu okhulupirira m’choonadi apitirize chikhulupiriro chawo; kuti iwo amene adalandira kale mawu a Mulungu ndiponso anthu onse okhulupirira moona asakhale ndi chikaiko china chilichonse; ndipo kuti onse amene m’mitima mwawo muli matenda pamodzi ndi anthu osakhulupirira anganene kuti: “Kodi Mulungu afuna kutanthauza chiyani pa chitsanzo chotere?” Mmenemo ndi mmene Mulungu amasokeretsera munthu aliyense amene Iye wamufuna ndi kutsogolera aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Palibe munthu amene amadziwa asirikali a Ambuye wako kupatula Iye mwini. Ichi si china chilichonse koma chikumbutso kwa anthu onse
Iyayi, ndilumbira pali mwezi
Ndi pali usiku pamene uli n’kutha
Ndi pali m’mbandakucha pamene uli n’kudza
Ndithudi ili ndi limodzi la masoka akuluakulu
Ndi chenjezo kwa anthu onse
Kwa yense wa inu amene afuna kupitirirabe mtsogolo kapena afuna kutsalira m’mbuyo
Munthu aliyense adzafunsidwa molingana ndi ntchito zake
Kupatula iwo amene adzakhala kudzanja lamanja
M’minda, iwo azidzafunsana wina ndi mnzake. Qiyamah
Za anthu ochimwa kuti
Kodi ndi chiyani chimene chakulowetsani inu ku moto
Iwo adzayankha nati: “Ife sitimapemphera.”
Ndiponso sitimadyetsa anthu a njala
Ife timangotsutsa zinthu mwaumbuli
Ndipo tidali kunena kuti kulibe tsiku lachiweruzo
Mpaka pamene imfa idatipeza
Motero palibe chidandaulo chochokera kwa wina aliyense chimene chidzamveka
Kodindichifukwachiyaniiwoalikuthawachikumbutso ichi
Monga abulu odzidzimutsidwa
omwe anali kuthawa Mlenje, Mkango kapena nyama ina yoopsya
Iai! Aliyense wa iwo afuna kuti apatsidwe masamba a Buku otambasula
Ndikosatheka! Koma iwo alibe mantha ndi zimene zili nkudza
Iyayi. Ndithudi ili ndi chenjezo
Motero musiyeni amene afuna kuti awerenge ndi kulandira chenjezo
Ndipo iwo sadzalandira chenjezo pokha pokha ngati Mulungu afuna. Iye ndiye Ambuye wofunika kuti anthu onse azichita mantha ndi Iye, ndipo Iye ndi Ambuye wokhululukira
Ine ndilumbira pali tsiku lachiweruzo
Ndipo ndilumbira pali munthu amene amadzidzudzula yekha
Kodi munthu amaganiza kuti Ife sitidzalumikiza mafupa ake
Inde Ife tikhoza kulumikiza mwaubwino nsonga za zala zake
Ngakhale tero, munthu amafuna kupitiliza kuchita zoipa
Iye amafunsa: “Kodi zimenezi zidzachitika liti?”
Motero pamene maso adzathodwa
Ndipo pamene mwezi udetsedwa
Pamene dzuwa ndi mwezi zidzakumana
Patsikuli munthu adzafunsa kuti: “Kodi ndithawira kuti tsopano?”
Iai! Kulibe malo othawirako
Ndi kwa Ambuye wako kokha kumene kudzakhala kothawira
Patsiku limeneli, munthu adzauzidwa zonse zimene adachita kuyambira poyamba mpaka pomaliza
Iai! Munthu adzadzichitira umboni wodzineneza yekha
Ngakhale kuti iye azidzayesa kudzipulumutsa yekha
Usagwedeze lilime lako zokhudza Korani ponena mofulumira
Ndi udindo wathu kuisonkhanitsa ndi kukupatsa nzeru kuilakatula iyo
Ndipo pamene talakatula, tsatira mwandondomeko kalakatulidwe kake
Ndi udindo wathu kukufotokozera tanthauzo lake
Iyayi!Komainumukondamoyowothamsanga
Ndipo simufuna kulabadira za moyo umene uli nkudza
Nkhope zina, pa tsiku limeneli, zidzakhala zowala ndi chisangalalo
Zili kuyang’ana kwa Ambuye wawo
Ndipo nkhope zina, patsiku limeneli, zidzakhala zachisoni
Pozindikira kuti chilango chowawa chidzagwa pa iwo
Iyayi, pamene ufika mpaka pa khosi
Ndipo kudzanenedwa kuti: “Kodi palibe woti angamuchize ndi kumupulumutsa ku imfa?”
Ndipo iye adzadziwa kuti awa ndi mathero a moyo wake
Ndipo mwendo udzatembenuzika pa unzake
Tsiku limeneli zonse zidzabwerera kwa Ambuye wako
Iye sanali kuvomereza chilungamo kapena kupemphera
Koma m’malo mwake adakana choonadi ndi kubwerera m’mbuyo
Ndipo iye anapita kubanja lake monyada ali kudziyamikila yekha
Tsoka kwa iwe. Ndiponso tsoka kwa iwe
Kachiwiri tsoka lili pafupi ndi iwe, tsopano tsoka lili pafupi
Kodi munthu amaganiza kuti tidzangomulekerera kuti azichita chilichonse chimene afuna
Kodi iye sanali dontho la umuna limene lidatuluka
Ndipo iye adakhala kam’bulu ka magazi. Ndipo Mulungu adamuumba ndipo adamukonza m’maonekedwe okongola
Ndipo adamulenga m’mitundu iwiri, mwamuna ndi mkazi
Kodi Iye alibe mphamvu yopereka moyo kwa anthu akufa
Kodi sipadali nthawi imene munthu sanali kanthu kena kali konse kodziwika
Ndithudi Ife tidamulenga munthu kuchokera ku madontho a umuna umene unasakanizidwa ndi ukazi ndi cholinga chomuyesa motero Ife tidamupanga iye kukhala wakumva ndi woona
Ndithudi Ife tamulangiza njira yabwino kaya iye akhala wothokoza kapena wosathokoza
Ndithudi tawakonzera anthu osakhulupirira unyolo ndi magoli ndi moto wa lawilawi
Ndithudi anthu onse angwiro adzamwa chakumwa chosakanizidwa ndi madzi ochokera pa kasupe wa ku Paradiso chotchedwa Kafur
Kasupe amene akapolo a Mulungu adzamwapo, amene amatumphutsa madzi ochuluka
Iwo amene amakwaniritsa malonjezo awo ndipo amakhala ndi mantha ndi tsiku limene zoipa zidzasefukira ponseponse
Ndipo amapereka chakudya chifukwa cha chikondi cha Mulungu, kwa anthu aumphawi, amasiye ndi kwa akaidi
Ife tili kukudyetsani chifukwa cha Mulungu basi. Ife sitifuna malipiro kapena mayamiko kuchokera kwa inu
Ndithudi ife tiopa tsiku loopsa ndi laululu limene lidzasanduliza nkhope kuoneka monyasa, limene lili nkudza kuchokera kwa Ambuye wathu
Motero Mulungu awapulumutsa iwo ku zoipa za tsiku limeneli ndi kuwapatsa nyali yokongola kuti akhale mosavutika ndi mwachisangalalo
Ndipo mphotho yawo idzakhala munda wa Paradiso ndi zovala za silika chifukwa chopirira kwawo
Ali kukhala m’Paradiso, pamipando yawofowofo, iwo sadzamva kutentha kwa dzuwa kapena kuzizira kwambiri
Ndipo mithunzi idzakhala pafupi ndi iwo ndipo zipatso zidzalendewera mu matsanzi kuti asamavutike pothyola
Ndipo pakati pawo padzaperekedwa zikho zozungulira za siliva ndi matambula a magalasi
Matambula oonetsa zinthu zomwe zili m’kati mwake, opangidwa kuchokera ku siliva. Iwo adzathiramo chakumwa molingana ndi chilakolako chawo
Ndipo iwo adzapatsidwa chakumwa kuchokera mu zikho zodzala ndi madzi osakaniza ndi Zanjabil
Kasupe amene ali komweko wotchedwa Salsabil
Ndipo adzazunguliridwa ndi ana owatumikira a misinkhu yofanana. Ndipo ngati iwe utawaona ukhoza kuganiza kuti ndi ndolo zomwazikamwazika
Ndipo pamene iwe uona kumeneko, udzaona madalitso ndi ufumu waukulu
Iwo adzavala nsalu zokongola za silika zooneka ngati msipu zopetedwa ndi golide. Iwo adzavala zibangiri za siliva ndipo Ambuye wawo adzawapatsa chakumwa chabwino
Ndithudi iyi ndi mphotho yanu ndipo kupirira kwanu kwalandiridwa
Ndithudi ndife amene tavumbulutsa kwa iwe pang’ono pang’ono, Buku lolemekezeka la Korani
Motero pirira ndipo tsatira malamulo a Ambuye wako ndipo usamvere zonena za munthu wochimwa kapena wosakhulupirira amene ali pakati pawo
Ndipo uzilemekeza dzina la Ambuye wako m’mawa ndi madzulo
Ndi m’gawo lina la usiku, uzimupembedza Iye ndipo uzimulemekeza Iye usiku wonse
Ndithudi! Awa amakonda kwambiri moyo wa msanga msanga wa masiku ano, ndipo amaiwala tsiku limenelidzakhalalovuta
Ndifeamenetidawalengandipo tinaika mphamvu m’ziwalo zawo. Koma ngati Ife titafuna, tikhoza kulenga anthu ena kuti alowe m’malo mwawo
Ndithudi! Ili ndi chenjezo motero aliyense amene afuna, mulekeni kuti atsatire njira yoyenera yopita kwa Ambuye wake
Koma inu simudzatha kutero pokhapokha ndi chifuniro cha Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndiye Mwini kudziwa ndi Mwini nzeru
Iye adzaonetsa chisomo chake kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Koma anthu ochimwa, Iye wawakonzera iwo chilango chowawa
Pali mphepo imene imatsatana pafupipafupi
Pali mphepo ya mkuntho
Pali mphepo imene imamwaza mitambo ndi mvula
Pali mavesi amene amasiyanitsa chabwino
Pali angelo amene amabweretsa chivumbulutso kwa Atumwi
Kuthetsa kukangana kapena kuwachenjeza
Ndithudi zonse zimene mwalonjezedwa zidzachitika
Pamene nyenyezi zidetsedwa
Ndi pamene thambo la kumwamba ling’ambika pakati
Ndi pamene mapiri aphwanyika kukhala fumbi
Ndi pamene Atumwi onse asonkhanitsidwa kukhala pamalo amodzi
Kodi ndi tsiku liti limene izi zidzachitike
Lidzakhala tsiku la chiweruzo
Kodi ndi chiyani chidzakudziwitse zatsiku la chiweruzo
Tsoka pa tsiku limeneli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Kodi Ife sitinaononge anthu a makedzana
Kotero tidzaipanga mibadwo yotsatira kuti ione zomwezo
Mmenemu ndi mmene timakhaulitsira anthu ochita zoipa
Tsoka pa tsikuli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Kodi sitidakulengeni inu kuchokera ku madzi onyozeka
Amene tidasunga pamalo okhazikika
Mpaka nthawi yake itakwana
Motero Ife tinayesa ndipo Ife wodziwa kuyesa
Tsoka pa tsikuli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Kodi Ife sitinapange nthaka ngati malo okumaniranamo
Amoyo ndi akufa
Ndipo tidalenga Al Mursalat	635 mapiri atali pa dziko ndi kukupatsani madzi okoma kuti muzimwa
Tsoka pa tsikuli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
(Zidzanenedwa kuti): “Pitani ku chilango chimene munkati sichidzabwera!”
Pitani inu mu chithunzi, mu magulu atatu
Opanda mthunzi kapena pokhala pokutetezani ku malawi a moto
Ndithudi! Umatulutsa malawi ake akulu akulu ngati nyumba zachifumu
Ndipo ooneka ngati ngamira ya chikasu
Tsoka pa tsiku limeneli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Patsiku limeneli iwo sadzatha kulankhula
Ndipo sadzaloledwa kuti apereke chidandaulo
Tsoka pa tsiku limeneli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Limeneli ndilo tsiku la chiweruzo. Ife takusonkhanitsani nonse pamodzi ndi anthu a makedzana
Tsopano ngati inu muli ndi chiwembu, chitani chiwembu chanu kwa Ine
Tsoka pa tsiku limeneli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Ndithudi anthu angwiro adzakhala mu mthunzi wozizira ndi pa akasupe
Ndi zipatso zimene afuna kukhosi kwawo
Idyani ndipo imwani mosangalala chifukwa cha zimene mudachita
Ndithudi, mmenemo ndi mmene timalipirira anthu angwiro
Tsoka pa tsikuli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Idyani ndipo musangalale kwa kanthawi kochepa. Ndithudi inu ndinu oipa kwambiri
Tsoka pa tsikuli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Ndipo zikanenedwa kwa iwo kuti: “Weramani.” Iwo amakana kutero
Tsoka pa tsikuli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Kodi ndi Uthenga uti woposa uwu umene adzaukhulupirire
